name: Muerta
title: Master of Death
lore: Muerta was a revolutionary who was executed and returned as the Master of Death, wielding spectral guns.

deadShot.name: Dead Shot
deadShot.description: Fires a spectral bullet that bounces off terrain, fearing and damaging enemies.

theCallings.name: The Calling
theCallings.description: Summons spirits that slow enemies and damage them based on attack damage.

gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.description: Muerta's attacks have a chance to fire an extra bullet at a random visible enemy.

pierceTheVeil.name: Pierce the Veil
pierceTheVeil.description: Muerta enters the spirit world, becoming ethereal. Her attacks become magical and can't miss.
